oig.gloss: the investigative arm of the Federal Trade Commission

oil.gloss: oil paint containing pigment that is used by an artist
a dark oil consisting mainly of hydrocarbons
any of a group of liquid edible fats that are obtained from plants
administer an oil or ointment to

oil-rich seed.gloss: any of several seeds that yield oil

oil business.gloss: an industry that produces and delivers oil and oil products

oil color.gloss: oil paint containing pigment that is used by an artist

oil colour.gloss: oil paint containing pigment that is used by an artist

oil future.gloss: petroleum bought or sold at an agreed price for delivery at a specified future date

oil heater.gloss: heater that burns oil (as kerosine) for heating or cooking

oil industry.gloss: an industry that produces and delivers oil and oil products

oil lamp.gloss: a lamp that burns oil (as kerosine) for light

oil of cloves.gloss: essential oil obtained from cloves and used to flavor medicines

oil of turpentine.gloss: volatile liquid distilled from turpentine oleoresin

oil of vitriol.gloss: (H2SO4) a highly corrosive acid made from sulfur dioxide

oil of wintergreen.gloss: oil or flavoring obtained from the creeping wintergreen or teaberry plant

oil production.gloss: the act of drilling a hole in the earth in the hope of producing petroleum

oil rig.gloss: rig used in drilling for oil or gas

oil rigger.gloss: someone who works on an oil rig

oil tanker.gloss: a cargo ship designed to carry crude oil in bulk

oil well.gloss: a well that yields or has yielded oil

oilbird.gloss: nocturnal fruit-eating bird of South America that has fatty young yielding an oil that is used instead of butter

oiler.gloss: a well that yields or has yielded oil
a cargo ship designed to carry crude oil in bulk

oiliness.gloss: consisting of or covered with oil

oilrig.gloss: rig used in drilling for oil or gas

oilseed.gloss: any of several seeds that yield oil

oilskin.gloss: a macintosh made from cotton fabric treated with oil and pigment to make it waterproof

oilstove.gloss: heater that burns oil (as kerosine) for heating or cooking

oink.gloss: the short low gruff noise of the kind made by hogs
utter a high-pitched cry, characteristic of pigs

ointment.gloss: semisolid preparation (usually containing a medicine) applied externally as a remedy or for soothing an irritation
toiletry consisting of any of various substances in the form of a thick liquid that have a soothing and moisturizing effect when applied to the skin

ois.gloss: agency that oversees the intelligence relationships of the Treasury's offices and bureaus and provides a link between the Intelligence Community and officials responsible for international economic policy

oily.gloss: containing an unusual amount of grease or oil
unpleasantly and excessively suave or ingratiating in manner or speech
